org.mule.modules.openidconnect.config

Class ConnectorConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mule.modules.openidconnect.config.ConnectorConfig

  • @Configuration(friendlyName="Configuration")
public class ConnectorConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the global connector configuration supported by the anypoint devkit. Configures all necessary parameters to communicate with the identity provider.
    Author:
    Moritz MÃ¶ller, AOE GmbH
